title: Bridging
description:
Registry Entry
Conveying pressure low

Suspicion
Bridging in Silo 2

Solution
Silofluidisation (Pulsator) in ATI activated

title: Leakage in Conveying System / Wear in Rotary Valve
description:
Registry Entry
Conveying pressure constantly increasing for 5 hours

Suspicion
Leakage in Conveying System / Wear in Rotary Valve

Solution
Performance is increased

title: Uncontrolled Material Flow
description:
Registry Entry
Synced peaks of torque (Extruder) and refilling (Feeder) every 150 seconds

Suspicion
Uncontrolled material flow in volumetric mode

Solution
Extruder increases low-level, to avoid Durchschießen

title: Leakage in Conveying System / Wear in Rotary Valve
description:

Conveying pressure constantly increasing for 5 hours

Suspicion

Solution

title: Filterbags have been replaced
description: Filter differential pressure abnormal high value = 18 mbar.

title: Conveying pressure low <= 200 mbar
description: No / insufficient product feed in pressure conveying line of finished product handling.

title: Conveying pressure low = -250 mbar
description: No / insufficient product feed in suction conveying line.
